title: Prime Day 2019: Best home coffee machines and vacuum cleaners
text:
Whether you've had your eye on a new smoothie maker or are looking to treat yourself to a new toaster, Amazon's huge Prime Day sale offers the perfect opportunity to bag a bargain on a range of home and kitchen appliances.

The annual online shopping event is finally here, with discounts on more than a million products which are up for grabs for Prime members only.

If you're not a Prime member, fear not – you can sign up now, and with the online retailer currently offering £20 off its annual subscription, there's never been a better time to join.

We will be constantly updating the best deals on home and kitchen appliances deals across Amazon's sale, running from today for 48 hours.

We're also rounding up the best discounts on Amazon's own devices, tech, and gardening and DIY, so be sure to check our other deal pages for more bargains.

Our IndyBest team has hand-picked every deal featured here. We may earn some commission from the links in this article, but our selections have been made independently and without bias. This revenue helps to fund journalism across The Independent.
